issues: Highly reflective and refractive materials (gold/gems) can sometimes result in hollow or uneven geometry in AI generation
all_evaluations.recommendation: This is a near-perfect input image. The clean background, sharp focus, and distinct shadow provide excellent data for 3D reconstruction. It is highly suitable for conversion.

issues: Strict side profile view obscures the circular shape/hole of the ring
Lack of perspective depth makes the object look like a straight bar
all_evaluations.recommendation: The technical quality (lighting, resolution, background) is perfect, but the angle is poor for topology. Rotate to a 3/4 view so the AI can see the ring's loop structure.

issues: Background color matches gemstone hue (green on green), risking segmentation errors
Textured velvet background is not ideal neutral solid color
Shallow depth of field causes slight blur on the back of the band
all_evaluations.recommendation: Excellent source image overall due to sharp geometry and perfect 3/4 angle. Pre-processing to remove the background is recommended to ensure the emeralds are not confused with the dark green backdrop.

selection_reason: This is a near-perfect input image. The clean background, sharp focus, and distinct shadow provide excellent data for 3D reconstruction. It is highly suitable for conversion.
